string-array.name: inspiring_quotes
string-array.item: "Hope is praying for rain, but faith is bringing an umbrella."
"You do not need to work to become spiritual. You are spiritual; you need only to remember that fact. Spirit is within you. God is within you."
"You can\'t have a physical transformation until you have a spiritual transformation."
"Living in the present moment creates the experience of eternity."
"If you lose money you lose much, if you lose friends you lose more, if you lose faith you lose all."
"Just as a candle cannot burn without fire, man cannot live without a spiritual life."
"Spirituality: the art of keeping your internal fire alive."
"Do anything, but let it produce joy."
"You can read books without ever stepping into a library; and practice spirituality without ever going to a temple."
"We are all connected; To each other, biologically. To the earth, chemically. To the rest of the universe atomically."
"The divine is not something high above us. It is in heaven, it is in earth, it is inside us."
